entities.name: grawp
entities.description: Grawp is described as an undersized giant and a gargantuan monster trying to crush people on the upper floors. He has yellow, half brick-sized teeth and launches himself at his smaller kin with savagery.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as realizing that Grawp was an undersized giant and he roars to tell others to run. He runs so fast that they are halfway toward the forest before being brought up short again.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is described as having her hand seized by Harry and they both tear down the steps into the grounds.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is described as bringing up the rear of the group as they run down the steps into the grounds.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is mentioned as someone Harry hopes to find and save.

entities.name: gargantuan monster
entities.description: The gargantuan monster is described as trying to crush people on the upper floors.

entities.name: giants
entities.description: The giants are described as wrestling each other with savagery.

entities.name: forest
entities.description: The forest is mentioned as a location that Harry and his friends are heading towards.

entities.name: castle
entities.description: The castle is described as being surrounded by the giants and having stone steps that tremble when Grawp stomps towards it.
